channel.title: [PI] Weird Bug [PI] - read for Detailed Info
channel.description:
Ok so on my server there is this weird bug/glitch.
Ok. So.. when someone FIRST connects to my server it's like their account gets automatically muted, but when they make a new account, it makes it their SECOND account and that one is just fine...?
If you need a more detailed description, or know how to fix please add me on msn: razor_mciver@yahoo.com
Or post here pleasee!
Thanks!
